channel.title: Andrew Marr on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Andrew Marr on The Majority

item.title: Sturgeon’s stepping stones
item.description: It seems to me that there is a gap between presentation - very, very good presentation - and the reality. When it comes to Coronavirus data, when it comes to education, when it comes to the Alex Salmond issue. There is a gap between how you present yourself - very, very effectively - and what’s really been going on in Scotland. Andrew Marr, questioning Nicola Sturgeon - 29th November, 2020 Not long after Nicola Sturgeon made the promise of a (UK funded) £500-pound tax-free bonus to all NHS staff at the annual SNP rally, the real intent of her words was made clear.
